statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE emission_year = 2022;
SELECT supplier_name, emission_value FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE emission_value > 5000;
SELECT supplier_name, emission_value FROM carbon_emissions_data ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT MAX(emission_value) as max_emission_value, MIN(emission_value) as min_emission_value FROM carbon_emissions_data;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE emission_year = 2021 ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_emissions_data GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_emissions > 10000;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, emission_value, emission_year FROM carbon_emissions_data ORDER BY emission_year ASC, emission_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE emission_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND emission_year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY emission_year ASC, emission_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, location FROM suppliers WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT id, name, carbon_emissions FROM suppliers WHERE carbon_emissions < 50 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC;
SELECT e.supplier_id, s.name, e.emissions_date FROM emissions_data e JOIN suppliers s ON e.supplier_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE carbon_emissions > 100
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE carbon_emissions < 50
SELECT id, name, location, carbon_emissions FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT suppliers.name, emissions_data.emissions_amount FROM suppliers JOIN emissions_data ON suppliers.id = emissions_data.supplier_id
SELECT suppliers.name AS supplier_name, SUM(emissions_amount) AS total_emissions FROM suppliers JOIN emissions_data ON suppliers.id = emissions_data.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.name
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM suppliers ORDER BY country, supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE emission_value > 100 ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT e.emission_id, e.emission_date, a.analysis_result FROM emissions e JOIN analysis a ON e.emission_id = a.emission_id;
SELECT supplier_name, country, emission_rate FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, emission_rate FROM suppliers ORDER BY emission_rate DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, e.emission_value, a.analysis_result FROM suppliers s JOIN emissions e ON s.supplier_id = e.supplier_id JOIN analysis a ON e.emission_id = a.emission_id WHERE s.supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND a.analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT s.supplier_name, e.emission_date FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN emissions e ON s.supplier_id = e.supplier_id WHERE e.emission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, total_emissions FROM Suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, emission_date, emission_amount FROM EmissionsData ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, category_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierCategories sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id JOIN EmissionCategories ec ON sc.category_id = ec.category_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, total_emissions FROM Suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, emission_date, emission_amount FROM EmissionsData ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, sc.category_id, ec.category_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierCategories sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id JOIN EmissionCategories ec ON sc.category_id = ec.category_id;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM EmissionsData GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(emission_amount) > 500;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM Suppliers;
SELECT record_id, supplier_id, emission_value, report_date FROM EmissionsData ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, address_line1, city, country FROM SupplierAddresses WHERE country='USA';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM EmissionCategories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT contact_id, supplier_id, contact_name, email FROM SupplierContacts ORDER BY supplier_id, contact_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM EmissionsData WHERE emission_value > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierAddresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierAddresses.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, emission_value, report_date FROM Suppliers JOIN EmissionsData ON Suppliers.supplier_id = EmissionsData.supplier_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierContacts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierContacts.supplier_id WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
